contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 18, 2001 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-fourth-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - cornet Briton Ferry. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed
Aug. 11, 2015, 4:34 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:53 p.m.
1 Severn Tunnel Band Hugh Bamford
2 Briton Ferry Band Mike Faro
3 Newtown Silver Band (Wales) David Evans
4 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Hann
5 Ystradgynlais Public Band Aled Jones
6 Blaenavon Concert Band Andrew Hicks
